program.class: template_class_name which is used for match against regex
program.issafe: true or false - to suppress execution warning message
program.executable: The program to execute, e.g. mstsc.exe
program.path: The path to the program to execute, e.g. C:\windows\system32
program.staticarg: The static argument string and the parameters %%ca** %%oa** as described above
